name: Fish Out of Water (KitsuneKit, Lexal, blkdragon)
name_original: Fish Out of Water (KitsuneKit, Lexal, blkdragon)
description:
Terrible News!

Blubs the Blowfish has been fishnapped by a gang of perilous pirates.  Out of the sea and out of luck, help Blubs flop his way to the waters of freedom!  With no sea legs to stand on, the only thing you can do is flop, hop and puff yourself up to get yourself out of this prickly situation in an action platformer without the ability to walk.

Keyboard controls

  • WASD - Movement (Only while airborne)
  • S - Deflate
  • Space - Flop
  • I - Inflate

Gamepad controls

  • Directional pad - Movement (Only while airborne)
  • Down - Deflate
  • A - Flop
  • X - Inflate

A Team Jumbo Game

LXLhunter, BLKDragon and KitsuneKit
